Class BinaryTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.iss.mv2.data.BinaryTools

  • public class BinaryTools
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides general input/output functionalities.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer

      • toByteArray

        public static byte[] toByteArray(int number)
        Returns the value of the given number encoded in ByteOrder.BIG_ENDIAN-format.
        Parameters:
        number - The number to convert.
        Returns:
        A byte array containing the ByteOrder.BIG_ENDIAN-encoded value.

      • readBytes

        public static byte[] readBytes(java.io.InputStream in,
                               int length)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               java.io.EOFException
        Reads the given amount of bytes from the input-stream.
        Parameters:
        in - The stream to read.
        length - The length of bytes to read from the input.
        Returns:
        A byte-array containing the read bytes.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        java.io.EOFException - Is thrown when the end of the steam is reached before all bytes are read.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
